com.hula.lang.parser.model

Class CommandModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.hula.lang.parser.model.CommandModel

  • public class CommandModel
extends java.lang.Object
    A data structure used during the parsing of a Hula script. Responsible for containing an object-based model of the script.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CommandModel()
      Create a new CommandModel

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addCommand(Command command)
      Add a Command to the CommandModel
      java.util.List<Command> getCommands()
      Get a list of parent Commands in the stack.
      Command getOpenCommand()
      Get the parent command the model is currently nesting under
      void insertCommand(Command command, int index)
      Insert a Command at a specific index in the current Command list
      boolean isNesting()
      Checks whether the CommandModel is in a state where Commands added to the model will be nested beneath a parent Command
      int lastIndexOf(java.lang.Class clazz)
      A helper method to find the last instance of a Command type at the current nesting level
      boolean nestedUnder(java.lang.Class clazz)
      A helper method to check if the Command model is nesting under a Command of the specified type.
      void startNesting(Command command)
      Nest all additional commands added to the model under this parent command
      void stopNesting()
      Stop nesting additional commands added to the model under the current parent command

      • CommandModel

        public CommandModel()
        Create a new CommandModel

    • Method Detail

      • addCommand

        public void addCommand(Command command)
        Add a Command to the CommandModel
        Parameters:
        command - the Command to add to the model

      • startNesting

        public void startNesting(Command command)
        Nest all additional commands added to the model under this parent command
        Parameters:
        command - The command to nest further commands under

      • stopNesting

        public void stopNesting()
        Stop nesting additional commands added to the model under the current parent command

      • isNesting

        public boolean isNesting()
        Checks whether the CommandModel is in a state where Commands added to the model will be nested beneath a parent Command
        Returns:
        boolean indicating the nesting state of the command model

      • getOpenCommand

        public Command getOpenCommand()
        Get the parent command the model is currently nesting under
        Returns:
        The Command the model is currently nesting under

      • getCommands

        public java.util.List<Command> getCommands()
        Get a list of parent Commands in the stack. Commands which are nested beneath these can be retrieved by calling getCommands() from the parent Command.
        Returns:
        a list of commands

      • lastIndexOf

        public int lastIndexOf(java.lang.Class clazz)
        A helper method to find the last instance of a Command type at the current nesting level
        Parameters:
        clazz - The class type of the Command to match
        Returns:
        the index of the Command instance, or -1

      • nestedUnder

        public boolean nestedUnder(java.lang.Class clazz)
        A helper method to check if the Command model is nesting under a Command of the specified type. For example, could be used to check if the Loop Command would be a parent of the next Command added to the model
        Parameters:
        clazz - The class type of the Command to match
        Returns:
        boolean indicating if the class type is a parent

      • insertCommand

        public void insertCommand(Command command,
                 int index)
        Insert a Command at a specific index in the current Command list
        Parameters:
        command - the command to insert
        index - the position to insert the command
